SEARCH
Module sc2002OOP
Package sc2002OOP.obj.companyrepresentative

Class CompanyRepresentativeManager

java.lang.Object
sc2002OOP.obj.companyrepresentative.CompanyRepresentativeManager
public class CompanyRepresentativeManager extends Object

Company Representative Data Manager

This class serves as the dedicated manager for all CompanyRepresentative objects within the IPMS. It is responsible for initializing the data store, handling persistence (saving and loading), and providing robust methods for retrieving and filtering the accounts.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Kee Kai Wen, Kelvin Tay Wei Jie, Koay Jun Zhi, Lim Jia Wei Jerald, Teo Kai Jie
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static CompanyRepresentativeManager getInstance()
      Retrieves the singleton instance of the CompanyRepresentativeManager. If the instance does not exist, it loads representative data from the file and creates the instance.
      Returns:
      The single instance of the CompanyRepresentativeManager.

    • close

      public static void close()
      Saves the current list of company representatives to the file and destroys the singleton instance. This method should be called before the application closes to ensure data persistence.

    • retrieveCompanyReps

      public static ArrayList<CompanyRepresentative> retrieveCompanyReps()
      Reads and deserializes the CompanyRepresentative list from the persistent storage file.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all loaded CompanyRepresentative objects, or an empty list if the file is empty or an error occurs.

    • saveCompanyReps

      public static void saveCompanyReps(ArrayList<CompanyRepresentative> companyReps)
      Serializes and writes the current list of CompanyRepresentative objects to the persistent storage file.
      Parameters:
      companyReps - The ArrayList of CompanyRepresentative objects to be saved.

    • getCompanyReps

      public static ArrayList<CompanyRepresentative> getCompanyReps(String companyRepID, String companyID, String department, String position, String email, CompanyRepresentativeStatus status)
      Filters the entire list of Company Representatives based on multiple optional criteria. If a filter parameter is null or empty, it is ignored.
      Parameters:
      companyRepID - Optional filter for the representative's User ID (partial match allowed).
      companyID - Optional filter for the associated company ID (partial match allowed).
      department - Optional filter for the representative's department (partial match allowed).
      position - Optional filter for the representative's position (partial match allowed).
      email - Optional filter for the representative's email (partial match allowed).
      status - Optional filter for the representative's approval status.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of CompanyRepresentative objects matching the criteria.

    • getCompRepByID

      public static CompanyRepresentative getCompRepByID(String id)
      Retrieves a specific Company Representative by their unique User ID (email).
      Parameters:
      id - The unique User ID (email) of the representative to find.
      Returns:
      The matching CompanyRepresentative object, or null if no representative with the given ID exists.

    • register

      public static void register(Scanner sc)
      Guides a new user through the registration process for a Company Representative account. This method collects all required details, validates the Company ID and unique email, and registers the user with a default password and PENDING status.
      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner object for input.

    • getCompanyReps

      public static ArrayList<CompanyRepresentative> getCompanyReps()
      Retrieves the complete list of all CompanyRepresentative accounts currently managed in memory.
      Returns:
      The ArrayList of all company representatives.

    • setCompanyReps

      public static void setCompanyReps(ArrayList<CompanyRepresentative> companyRepresentatives)
      Replaces the current list of managed company representatives with a new list.
      Parameters:
      companyRepresentatives - The new ArrayList of CompanyRepresentative accounts to set.
